item.description:
Jazz and Strings Tribute to Ella Fitzgerald

 This is last minute but looks amazing. Joletta has offered to head this up, Check it out.....!!!


This is awesome: Gene Bozzi and members of the Hartford Symphony string section will celebrate Ella’s landmark album in an “Ella & Gershwin” tribute.  

FREE

MEETUP TIME: 6:45 PM

(NOT SURE WHERE YET AT THE PLAZA SINCE THIS IS MY FIRST TIME HOSTING AN EVENT IN HARTFORD. I WILL PROVIDE MY CELL # TO ATTENDEES). 

PERFORMANCE BEGINS: 7:30 PM

Rain Date: Sunday, June 19th


 

Just a heads up - they sell beer and wine onsite, so there's no bringing your own B. Please read below:

PARK RULES & REGULATIONS - Please note: Due to liability and legal restrictions, NO OUTSIDE ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES of any kind may be brought into the Riverfront Parks by any party.Riverfront Recapture is the only licensed authority to sell and serve liquor for consumption in the Riverfront Parks.



Mortensen Riverfront:
http://www.riverfront.org/parks/mortensen/

A jewel on the banks of the Connecticut River, Mortensen Riverfront plaza is the centerpiece of the Riverfront Park System. Spanning I-91, the park reunites downtown Hartford with
the waterfront, bringing pedestrians back to the shoreline and connecting Hartford with East Hartford through the Founders Bridge Promenade. Visitors can enjoy performances at the
amphitheater stage; take a boat cruise and/or order up some food.

 

PARKING:

***FREE PARKING @  Great River Park 301 East River Drive East Hartford, CT. PARK AND WALK ACROSS THE BRIDGE***

 

The Plaza does not have its own parking lot.  Parking is available at Hartford area garages, on-street parking, or you can park in East Hartford and take the short walk over the
Founders Bridge Promenade. PLEASE NOT ALL PARKING EVENT PRICES ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE!!! See Parking info below.

CT Science Center/ Riverfront Garage -$7 EVENT RATE

250 Columbus Blvd. – Entrance on Grove Street- located next to the

Plaza, this garage provides the most direct and convenient access to Riverfront Mortensen Plaza. (Handicap accessible)


Constitution Plaza Garage - $5 Event Rate

109 Constitution Plaza

The entrance to the elevator is to the right of the staircase. 


Morgan Street Garage - $4 Event Rate
155 Morgan Street – Entrance on Talcott Street
I'm suggesting this one because its the cheapest.

CT Convention Center Garage -$7 Event Rate

100 Columbus Boulevard.


I may not be the one to ask about parking since I'm still learning Hartford. I am not sure if parking is free on weekends. However here is a tel# to call

Central Parking: 860-527-9184.
item.how_to_find_us: Please call my cell# 214-679-6256. I'm a newbie to Hartford so I don't know all the ins and outs of the city as yet in terms of meeting locations.
item.name: Jazz and Strings Tribute to Ella Fitzgerald with Gene Bozzi & Hartford Symphony
